title: Can't see friends list?
body: I can see people in my club that are online but i can't see my friendslist. I repaired client and nothing happened..

replies.body: i think we just got defriended by everybody lol.

**Mindstar **has posted an announcement here in case your issue is still ongoing:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/B41QTqBZ-1542016-friends-list-chat-issues

> **_UPDATE 22:30_
> We've made some fixes to our servers that should hopefully resolve the issue. Let us know if it is fixed!**
> 
> Original Post
> 
> Hi folks,
> 
> We're aware of some issues with the chat system which are causing player's friends lists to not display correctly or at all.
> 
> We're working on it now so stay tuned for updates.
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar

Yeah, no friends for life </3
I ceebs readding people

Same here...I had to re-add the people that I knew of by Heart and it isn't a "they unfriended you!"
If you think that you are an idiot, so don't say stuff like that.
But...
1. will it be fixed (by riot)?
2. Is there are way to fix it (manual)?
